nodes.text: Vran Tristen was a Human male Darkwalker who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Following the Battle of Yavin, Vran Tristen was a leader of the Darkwalker criminals, holding the title of Bloodlord, who operated from a bunker in the Lasay Swamp. Circa 1 ABY, Tristen's group had stolen a valuable Gungan artifact. Boss Rugor Nass then sent a spacer to the Darkwalker bunker in order to retrieve the Gungan artifact. Several Darkwalkers, including Vran Tristen were killed during the assault.

Vran Tristen appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Vran Tristen was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
